singleItemContent: Did anybody teach you two fix things when you were a child?
Do you think it is necessary for people to learn to fix things?
What do you do when a thing is broken and cannot be fixed?
Describe an occasion when you spent time with a young child
When you spent time with this child
And how you felt about it
Do you think children should have a lot of toys?
Do you think there are too many rules for children to follow, whether at school or at home?
Do you think children should follow all the rules?
Do you think its necessary for parents to make decisions for their children?
Do you think its is good for parents to help their children choose friends?
